---
title: "RTCGAToolbox implementation of pradMAEO - <strong>PR</strong>ostate <strong>AD</strong>enocarcinoma <strong>M</strong>ulti<strong>A</strong>ssay<strong>E</strong>xperiment <strong>O</strong>bject"
author: "Lucas Schiffer"
date: "February 29, 2016"
output: html_document
---

This vignette is the current working document for the development of a prostate adenocarcinoma MultiAssayExperiment object. Data is taken from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) using the TCGAdownload() method of the TCGAbiolinks package, then manipulated to fit into the MultiAssayExperiment object.

GitHub Source <- <a href="https://github.com/schifferl/biocMultiAssay/blob/master/vignettes/pradMAEO-TCGAbiolinks.Rmd">https://github.com/schifferl/biocMultiAssay/blob/master/vignettes/pradMAEO.Rmd</a><br>
Rpubs HTML <- <a href="https://rpubs.com/schifferl/pradMAEO">https://rpubs.com/schifferl/pradMAEO-TCGAbiolinks</a>

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#install devtools
#install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

#install bioconductor
source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite()

#install rJava
install.packages("rJava")
library(rJava)

#install TCGAbiolinks
BiocInstaller::biocLite("TCGAbiolinks")
library(TCGAbiolinks)

#install biocMultiAssay
BiocInstaller::biocLite("vjcitn/biocMultiAssay")
library(biocMultiAssay)
```
